mapper.select: select store_no as storeNo, store_id as storeId, store_name as placeName, store_road_addr as roadAddr, s.status_no as statusNo, status_name as statusName from sales_store s inner join sales_status sc on s.status_no = sc.status_no where s.emp_id = #{empId} and s.sales_date = #{toDate}
select status_no as codeNo, status_name as codeName from sales_status order by status_no
